controls.caption: When not initialized
controls.name: whenNonInitialized
controls.description: This value is returned when the input scalar is not existing (not initialized)

controls.caption: When initialized
controls.name: whenInitialized
controls.description: This value is returned when the input scalar is existing (contains some data)

controls.caption: Require non-empty
controls.name: nonEmptyRequired
controls.description:
If set, an empty scalar (with zero length or containing only white space characters) is considered not existing: this function will return "When not initialized". Here "containing only white space characters" means condition s.trim().isEmpty(), where s is Java String object with the input scalar.
If cleared, the input string is not checked: this function only checks if the input is initialized.
